```{r setup}
library(SurvdigtizeR)
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
```

Image to be digitized 

![](FALSE_250_base_3.jpeg)

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

out1 <-parent_digitizer(curve_location = here::here("vignettes","FALSE_250_base_3.jpeg"),sen = 0.1,Wsen_i = 30,OCR_words_i = F,num_curves1 = 3,x_start_i = 0,x_end_i = 500,x_incr = 100,y_start_i = 0,y_end_i = 1,y_incr = 0.2,Y_values_vertical = F)
out1 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = time, y= St, color = as.factor(curve), group = curve)) +
  geom_step() + theme_bw() 
```
